definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be a stranger (Ar. za0ra (med. w) incline toward, repair to, visit; II. honour as visitor or guest; IX. decline, turn aside; za0y’irun visitor; Aram. [[זוּר]], oft. = Heb. [[סוּר]] turn aside, turn aside to visit)—
Pf. become estranged Ps 58:4, c. [[מן]] from Job 19:13, Ps 78:30.

definitions.title: Pt.
definitions.body: as adj. strange, or as noun stranger:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: to the family, of another household, [[אִישׁ זׇר]] De 25:5, elsewhere [[זׇר]] 1Ki 3:18, Job 19:15, Pr 6:1, Pr 11:15, Pr 20:16, Pr 27:13; [[זׇרִים]] Ps 109:11, Pr 5:10, Pr 5:17; [[בנים זרים]], children of another household than God's Ho 5:7; especially of another family than priests' [[אִישׁ זׇר]] Le 22:12 (H) Nu 17:5 (P); [[זׇר]] Le 22:10, Le 22:13 (H) Ex 29:33, Ex 30:33, Nu 3:10, Nu 3:38, Nu 18:7 (P); not belonging to the tribe of Levi, Nu 1:51, Nu 18:4 (P).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: to the person, another Job 19:27, Pr 14:10, Pr 27:2; [[זׇרָה]] ([[אִשָּׁה]]) strange woman, harlot Pr 2:16, Pr 5:3, Pr 5:20, Pr 7:5, Pr 22:14, Pr 23:33.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: to the land, foreign, [[זׇרִים]] foreigners (as such usu. enemies) Ho 7:9, Ho 8:7, Is 1:7, Is 1:7, Is 25:2, Is 25:5, Is 29:5, Is 61:5, Je 5:19, Je 30:8, Je 51:2, Je 51:51, La 5:2, Ez Eze 7:2, Eze 11:9, Eze 16:32, Eze 28:7, Eze 28:10, Eze 30:12, Eze 31:12, Joe 4:17, Ob:Ob 11, Job 15:19, Ps 54:5; [[אֵל זׇר]] foreign god Ps 44:21, Ps 81:10 = [[זׇר]] Is 43:12; so [[זׇרִים]] De 32:16 and (in fig.) Je 2:25, Je 3:13; [[מַיִם זׇרִים]] foreign waters 2Ki 19:24, Je 18:14; [[זְמׂרַת זׇר]] Is 17:10 vine-slip of a stranger; [[כְּמוֹ־זׇר נֶחְשָָׁבוּ]] Ho 8:12 they are regarded as foreign; [[מַעֲשֵׂהוּ זׇר]] Is 28:21 his work is foreign (as if dealing with enemies).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: strange to the law; [[קְטׂרֶת זׇרָה]] strange incense Ex 30:9 (P); [[אֵשׁ זׇרָה]] strange fire Le 10:1, Nu 3:4, Nu 26:61(P).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נׇז֫רׁוּ]] Is 1:4, Ez Eze 14:5; be estranged Is 1:4, pregn., sq. [[אָחוֹר]] (cf. RV); [[מֵעַל]] Ez Eze 14:5.
